description: Serve up the ultimate comforting dessert to guests. Oozing with sticky golden syrup, this delicious steamed pumpkin pudding just melts in your mouth.
name: Steamed Pumpkin & Golden Syrup Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To serve, beat cream until lightly whipped. Turn pudding out onto a plate and drizzle over with cream and syrup.
